channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: A mother in New Mexico clings to the hood of her own car as a thief takes off with it with her children inside; a Texas man pursues a driver after a collision in an intersection; a late-night driver in Washington loses control and rams into parked cars; a motorcyclist in Brazil has a run-in with a bus making a wide turn; in Mississippi, a trucker tries to rescue a family trapped in a fiery crash.
